venue.name: David Rockefeller Center for Latin Studies

item.description:
Hola hispanoparlantes,

Les quiero invitar a trabajar conmigo como voluntarios en este festival. Yo estare en las juntas este martes, y espero verles alli. No olviden contactar a Danielle por su email abajo con su RSVP.

Karin

---


THE 9TH ANNUAL BOSTON LATINO INTERNATIONAL FILM FESTIVAL:

COME JOIN OUR TEAM – WE ARE LOOKING FOR VOLUNTEERS!

Please RSVP by sending your Name, Date & Time of Attendance to:
Danielle Oliveira
doliveira@bliff.org

Volunteer Informational Session Dates:

Tuesday, Nov. 9th - 6:00-7:00 pm & 7:00-8:00 pm

Thursday, Nov. 18th - 6:30-7:30 & 7:30-8:30 pm

The meetings will be held at:

David Rockefeller Center for Latin American Studies
1730 Cambridge Street in the South Building of Harvard’s Center for
Government and International Studies on the 2nd floor. Room S216
-It’s a 5 minute walk from Harvard Square red line. Since parking is
scarce, public transportation is recommended.

This is a great opportunity to practice your Spanish. Most of our meetings are in English. Come have fun, learn about the film industry, make connections and have fun all during the process.

Please RSVP by sending your Name, Date & Time of Attendance to:
Danielle Oliveira
doliveira@bliff.org

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Volunteer for the Boston Latino International Film Festival
